bibl.title: English translation [from Spanish] of letter from Ignacio Alvare to Philip Showalter Hench, December 7, 1941

div1.p: Alvare informs Hench that he is meeting with Marrero to gather more information for him regarding Camp Lazear.

div1.head: English translation [from Spanish] of letter from Ignacio Alvare to Philip Showalter Hench, December 7, 1941 See Spanish original.
div1.p:
I received your letter of November 26 yesterday which came delayed
so that is the reason I did not answer before. I wish to say that this
afternoon I am going to the town of Santiago de las Vegas to see Dr. Marrero.
At that time he was a student at the Hospital Militar. I am going with him
to get more data for you and to see the place where that picture was taken.
I wish to say that that picture was not taken for me only; it was taken for
the whole group of students, who at that time were internes at the Hospital
Militar. Among those were Drs. Velasco Ruiz and Hernandez who are working
now in Santa Clara, Dr. Marrero who is working in Santiago de las Vegas, Dr.
Iglesias Betancourt, who are working here in Havana and others that I do not
mention, not to tire you out.

I want to make this clear because I do not wish to have you think that
the picture was taken on my account only. As soon as I find something more
about this matter I will let you know.
